main event: A civilian reported observing a quarter-sized orange flame object with a muffled roar that hovered and then faded out over Lahinia, Maui, Hawaii on January 20, 1956.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 25 minutes, The object was reported to be one in number, Furthermore, the observer had previously reported several UFO sightings in 1952 and early January 1956, The object was observed at a 20-degree angle of elevation and moved quickly before hovering, The investigation speculated that the object might have been an aircraft.
witness description: Civilian, aged 56, retired, observed through a screened window with house lights out.
